Method Detail

init

public void init(int width,
                 int height,
                 int difficulty,
                 double mineDensity,
                 Context context)
This is the initialisation method for the game, it handles all the game parameters like the width, height, difficulty, and minedensity

Parameters:
width - The screen width
height - The screen height
difficulty - The game difficulty
mineDensity - The game mine density
context - The game context

render

public void render(Canvas canvas)
This is the render method that passes the instance of canvas down to the appropriate child classes

Parameters:
canvas - The instance of canvas to be utilised by the child classes.

inputHandler

public void inputHandler(MotionEvent event)
This is the inputhandler method, it passes the MotionEvent down to the child classes to be parsed appropriately.

Parameters:
event - The instance of MotionEvent that holds all the input information
